mapper.select: select * from message order by message_Id desc
select message_Id, title, content, creation_date, creation_user, receiver from message where message_Id = #{ messageId }
mapper.insert: insert into message (title, content, creation_date, creation_user, receiver) values (#{ title }, #{ content }, #{ creationDate }, #{ creationUser }, #{ receiver })
mapper.delete: delete from message where message_Id = #{ messageId }
